definition: of or relating to the class Reptilia, any cold-blooded vertebrate of the class Reptilia including tortoises, turtles, snakes, lizards, alligators, crocodiles, and extinct forms
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the class Reptilia
noun
- any cold-blooded vertebrate of the class Reptilia including tortoises, turtles, snakes, lizards, alligators, crocodiles, and extinct forms
= synonyms: reptile
